verses.verse: Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about, <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H7231>multiply<s%> on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>land,<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> to them,

that the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> were <S%H2896>beautiful;<s%> and they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> for themselves, <S%H3605>whomever<s%> <S%H834><s%> they <S%H977>chose.<s%>

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "My <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> shall not <S%H1777>strive<s%> with <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> <S%H7683>because<s%> he <S%H7683>also<s%> is <S%H1320>flesh;<s%> nevertheless his <S%H3117>days<s%> shall be one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>"

The <S%H5303>Nephilim<s%> were on the <S%H776>earth<s%> in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H310>afterward,<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H834>when<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> in to the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H120>men,<s%> and they <S%H3205>bore<s%> [children] to them. <S%H1992>Those<s%> were the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> [were] of <S%H5769>old,<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H8034>renown.<s%>

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H9567>wickedness<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> was <S%H7227>great<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and that <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3336>intent<s%> of the <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> of his <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H7534>only<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3605>continually.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was <S%H5162>sorry<s%> that He had <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and He was <S%H6087>grieved<s%> in His <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will <S%H4229>blot<s%> out <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I have <S%H1254>created<s%> from the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>land,<s%> from <S%H120>man<s%> to <S%H929>animals<s%> to <S%H7431>creeping<s%> <S%H7431>things<s%> and to <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky;<s%> for I <S%H5162>am<s%> <S%H5162>sorry<s%> that I have <S%H6213>made<s%> them."
But <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> are [the records of] the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah.<s%> <S%H5146>Noah<s%> was a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H8549>blameless<s%> in his <S%H1755>time;<s%> <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> with <S%H430>God.<s%>
And <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons:<s%> <S%H8035>Shem,<s%> <S%H2526>Ham,<s%> and <S%H3315>Japheth.<s%>
Now the <S%H776>earth<s%> was <S%H7843>corrupt<s%> in the <S%H6440>sight<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> was <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H2555>violence.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>looked<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it was <S%H7843>corrupt;<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> had <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> their <S%H1870>way<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

Then <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> "The <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> has <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Me; for the <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H2555>violence<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of them; and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I am about to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> them with the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

<S%H6213>"Make<s%> for yourself an <S%H8392>ark<s%> of <S%H1613>gopher<s%> <S%H6086>wood;<s%> you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H8392>ark<s%> with <S%H7064>rooms,<s%> and shall <S%H9216>cover<s%> it <S%H4480>inside<s%> <S%H1004><s%> and out with <S%H9217>pitch.<s%>

"And <S%H2088>this<s%> is <S%H834>how<s%> you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> it: the <S%H753>length<s%> of the <S%H8392>ark<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> its <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and its <S%H6967>height<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

"You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H9472>window<s%> for the <S%H8392>ark,<s%> and <S%H3615>finish<s%> it to a <S%H520>cubit<s%> from the <S%H4605>top;<s%> and <S%H7760>set<s%> the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H8392>ark<s%> in the <S%H6654>side<s%> of it; you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> it with <S%H8482>lower,<s%> <S%H8145>second,<s%> and <S%H7992>third<s%> decks.

"And <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I, even I am <S%H935>bringing<s%> the <S%H3999>flood<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth,<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> is the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of <S%H9132>life,<s%> from <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H8064>heaven;<s%> <S%H3605>everything<s%> that is on the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H1478>perish.<s%>

"But I will <S%H6965>establish<s%> My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with you; and you shall <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H8392>ark<s%> â€“ you and your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H802>wife,<s%> and your sons' <S%H802>wives<s%> with you.

"And of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H2416>thing<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> [kind] into the <S%H8392>ark,<s%> to <S%H2421>keep<s%> [them] <S%H2421>alive<s%> with you; they shall be <S%H2145>male<s%> and <S%H5347>female.<s%>

"Of the <S%H5775>birds<s%> after their <S%H4327>kind,<s%> and of the <S%H929>animals<s%> after their <S%H4327>kind,<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7431>creeping<s%> <S%H7431>thing<s%> of the <S%H127>ground<s%> after its <S%H4327>kind,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> [kind] shall <S%H935>come<s%> to you to <S%H2421>keep<s%> [them] <S%H2421>alive.<s%>

"And as for you, <S%H3947>take<s%> for yourself <S%H4480>some<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3978>food<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H398>edible,<s%> and <S%H622>gather<s%> [it] to yourself; and it shall be for <S%H402>food<s%> for you and for them."
Thus <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H6213>did;<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him, <S%H3651>so<s%> he <S%H6213>did.<s%>
